definitions.definition: An ornament or knob in the shape of a flower
The small decorative flower at the centre of each side of a Corinthian abacus ; a flos .
A decorative typographic element, used to separate passages or simply for decoration. Often doubled, e.g. ðŸ™š ðŸ™˜ or ðŸ™˜ðŸ™š, or combined with other fleurons into a short line.
